channel.title: penetration on Pwn the world.
channel.description: Recent content in penetration on Pwn the world.

item.title: Serial 2
item.description: Name: serial: 2 Date release: 27 Sep 2019 Author: sk4 Series: serial Initial Discovery VMIP is the VM’s IP Address LHIP is the Local Host’s IP Address Compare the commands I ran, and the formats specified to check where you need to replace values according to your machine. IP Discovery Run sudo netdiscover. It detects online hosts by sending ARP requests. Output of netdiscover. 192.168.1.10 happens to be the IP of the VM.

item.title: Serial 1
item.description: Name: serial: 1 Date release: 20 Aug 2019 Author: sk4 Series: serial Initial Discovery VMIP is the VM’s IP Address LHIP is the Local Host’s IP Address Compare the commands I ran, and the formats specified to check where you need to replace values according to your machine. IP Discovery Run sudo netdiscover. It detects online hosts by sending ARP requests. Output of netdiscover. 192.168.1.8 happens to be the IP of the VM.
